overview: Things begun well for David. Laura, the "Belle de Nuit" who came asking for help, had a superb body. Quite generous with her charms, she expressed her gratitude convincingly. Then she disappeared. A few weeks later, David thought he could find her but people who met her remained mysteriously evasive. And what was the purpose of those swarms of pretty girls who offered themselves generously before disappearing? He would find it soon after discovering that a man manipulates this little world.
title: Night Shock
